items.sentence: We just barely had enough time to eat lunch.

Try on this new suit to see if it fits well.

Tom deeply regretted doing what he had done.
Tom described what happened in great detail.
Tom did his best to hide his disappointment.
Tom got angry when he found the door locked.
Tom put the knife down on the kitchen table.
Tom put the milk back into the refrigerator.
Tom tried on the coat, but it was too small.
Wait a minute. I want to tell you something.
Tom must\'ve thought Mary couldn\'t do that.
Tom must\'ve thought Mary wouldn\'t do that.
I\'m in prison for a crime I didn\'t commit.
Money doesn\'t necessarily make you happier.

We still need to buy Tom a birthday present.
